title: Test Scenario DSL
description: A test scenario with test cases to validate the business process.

testCases.description: The test cases of the scenario.

TestCase.description: A test case with instructions to validate the business process.

name.description: The name of the test case.

description.description: The description of the test case.

instructions.description: The instructions of the test case.

TestCaseInstruction.description: An instruction to define an action or an assertion to be performed in a test case.

CreateProcessInstanceInstruction.description: An instruction to create a new process instance.

processDefinitionSelector.description: The selector to identify the process definition to create the process instance for.

variables.description: The variables to create the process instance with.

startInstructions.description: The instructions to execute when starting the process instance.

elementId.description: The ID of the element to start the process instance at.

runtimeInstructions.description: The instructions to affect the runtime behavior of the process instance.

oneOf.description: An instruction to terminate the process instance at a specific element.

type.description: The type of the runtime instruction.

afterElementId.description: The ID of the element after which to terminate the process instance.

ProcessDefinitionSelector.description: A selector to identify a process definition.

processDefinitionId.description: The ID of the process definition.

CompleteUserTaskInstruction.description: An instruction to complete a user task.

userTaskSelector.description: The selector to identify the user task to complete.

variables.description: The variables to set when completing the user task. Ignored if useExampleData is true.

useExampleData.description: Whether to complete the user task with example data from the BPMN element. If true, the variables property is ignored.

AssertProcessInstanceInstruction.description: An instruction to assert the state of a process instance.

processInstanceSelector.description: The selector to identify the process instance.

state.description: The expected state of the process instance.

hasActiveIncidents.description: Whether the process instance has active incidents.

ProcessInstanceSelector.description: A selector to identify a process instance.

processDefinitionId.description: The process definition ID of the process instance.

AssertProcessInstanceMessageSubscription.description: An instruction to assert the state of a process instance message subscription.

processInstanceSelector.description: The selector to identify the process instance.

messageSelector.description: The selector to identify the message.

state.description: The expected state of the message subscription.

MessageSelector.description: A selector to identify a message.

correlationKey.description: The correlation key of the message.

AssertElementInstanceInstruction.description: An instruction to assert the state of an element instance.

processInstanceSelector.description: The selector to identify the process instance.

elementSelector.description: The selector to identify the element.

state.description: The expected state of the element instance.

amount.description: The expected amount of element instances in the given state.

AssertElementInstancesInstruction.description: An instruction to assert the state of multiple element instances.

processInstanceSelector.description: The selector to identify the process instance.

elementSelectors.description: The selectors to identify the elements.

state.description: The expected state of the element instances.

ElementSelector.description: A selector to identify a BPMN element.

elementId.description: The ID of the BPMN element.

elementName.description: The name of the BPMN element.

AssertUserTaskInstruction.description: An instruction to assert the state of a user task.

userTaskSelector.description: The selector to identify the user task.

state.description: The expected state of the user task.

assignee.description: The expected assignee of the user task.

candidateGroups.description: The expected candidate groups of the user task.

priority.description: The expected priority of the user task.

elementId.description: The expected element ID of the user task.

name.description: The expected name of the user task.

dueDate.description: The expected due date of the user task in ISO-8601 format.

followUpDate.description: The expected follow-up date of the user task in ISO-8601 format.

CompleteJobInstruction.description: An instruction to complete a job.

jobSelector.description: The selector to identify the job to complete.

variables.description: The variables to complete the job with. Defaults to an empty map.

useExampleData.description: Whether to complete the job with example data from the BPMN element. This property has precedence over variables. Defaults to false.

JobSelector.description: A selector to identify a job.

elementId.description: The ID of the BPMN element.

processDefinitionId.description: The process definition ID of the job.

UserTaskSelector.description: A selector to identify a user task.

elementId.description: The ID of the BPMN element.

taskName.description: The name of the user task.

processDefinitionId.description: The process definition ID of the user task.

PublishMessageInstruction.description: An instruction to publish a message.

correlationKey.description: The correlation key of the message.

variables.description: The variables to publish with the message.

timeToLive.description: The time-to-live of the message in milliseconds.

MockDmnDecisionInstruction.description: An instruction to mock a DMN decision.

decisionDefinitionId.description: The decision definition ID to mock.

variables.description: The variables to set as the decision output.

MockChildProcessInstruction.description: An instruction to mock a child process.

processDefinitionId.description: The ID of the child process to mock.

variables.description: The variables to set for the mocked child process.

MockJobWorkerCompleteJobInstruction.description: An instruction to mock a job worker who completes jobs.

jobType.description: The job type to mock. This should match the zeebeJobType in the BPMN model.

variables.description: The variables to complete the job with.

useExampleData.description: Whether to use example data from the BPMN element. If true, the variables property is ignored.

AssertVariablesInstruction.description: An instruction to assert the variables of a process instance.

processInstanceSelector.description: The selector to identify the process instance.

elementSelector.description: The selector to identify the element for local variables.

variables.description: The expected variables with their values.

EvaluateConditionalStartEventInstruction.description: An instruction to evaluate conditional start events.

variables.description: The variables to evaluate the conditional start events with.
